summary: This appears to be an email chain from August 12, 2019, concerning a potential leak of hospital recordings related to Jeffrey Epstein. The subject line references documents and a request, and it is forwarded to a Regional Director in the Northeast region.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in the subject line regarding a potential leak of hospital recordings.

events.title: Email regarding potential leak of Epstein hospital recordings
events.description: An email is sent concerning a potential leak of hospital recordings related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: An email dated August 12, 2019, discusses a potential leak of hospital recordings involving Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence is forwarded to a Regional Director in the Northeast region, indicating an internal review or investigation.
The subject line references document numbers and an urgent request, suggesting official concern over the leak.
